external_references.description: Adam Burgher. (2021, June 10). BackdoorDiplomacy: Upgrading from Quarian to Turian. Retrieved September 1, 2021

description: [BackdoorDiplomacy](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0135) has exploited CVE-2020-5902, an F5 BIP-IP vulnerability, to drop a Linux backdoor. [BackdoorDiplomacy](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0135) has also exploited mis-configured Plesk servers.(Citation: ESET BackdoorDiplomacy Jun 2021)
